title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 124.8 - Severability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 124.8 - Severability

State Regulations

If any provision of this Part or its application to any
particular person or circumstance is held invalid, the remainder of this Part
and its application to other persons and circumstances shall not be affected
thereby. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
124.8

Adopted

New

York State Register September 27, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 39, eff. 9/27/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
